Also in the code I have it does not read the value either.  We had the can set to one and we have the motor controller updated. I am using the REV robotics example code, but with a smartdashboard.getvalue for the number and I use the encoder object as the input for the value. Can someone help or show me what they use as there code for an example for me to base a test off of to test to see if the encoder works.\u003cbr\u003e\nthis is what I am using:\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003ca class=\"attachment\" href=\"/uploads/short-url/iWBJuRbVgg69M8xQwYbH7dPwdb8.java\"\u003eRobot.java\u003c/a\u003e (1.7 KB)\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2023-01-26T03:06:23.427Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":60,"readers_count":59,"score":42.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":424709,"topic_slug":"not-collecting-encoder-data-from-neo-motors-in-rev-dashboard-or-in-code","display_username":"Landon","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"/uploads/short-url/iWBJuRbVgg69M8xQwYbH7dPwdb8.java","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53962,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/not-collecting-encoder-data-from-neo-motors-in-rev-dashboard-or-in-code/424709/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3134188,"name":"Andy Gasser","username":"gdefender","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gdefender/{size}/168507_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-26T05:58:51.356Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWhat value do you get, 0?
